title: Project title name
description: This is the place to put in the project description. Describe what it does and who does it help / who does it benefit. Also describe why you start this project, and maybe how it improves your skills.
details: Describe the technologies involved and how it helped in achieving our purpose. This way we can get a deeper grasp of the technical details while also setting up for the difficulties and triumphs down the line.
